Title: N/A

reviewText: I didn't know about this wonderful series of cooking shows since I don't really watch much TV.  I missed a great series!  What I love most about this series of cooking shows is the real and funny interactions between the couple and the delicious, fresh, southern food recipes without a bunch of exotic ingredients.It is very entertaining to watch how Gina and Pat Neely work together in the kitchen.  You can tell they really love each other.  Sometimes their family members join them in the kitchen and they are just as entertaining.Gina & Pat give great tips on cooking techniques.  Every dish I have triedI enjoyed this DVD set I am going to buy their cookbook!There are at least 4 cooking shows on each of the 3 DVDs and each cooking show details at least 5 recipes.  This is a keeper.
summary: Funny & Loving Couple - Fabulous Southern Soul Food!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love the Food Network and this is one of my favorite shows. I was thrilled to see it come to DVD (commercial free!) so I can enjoy my favorite episodes at home. The Neelys are BBQ rock stars and this series is dedicated to bringing that experience to a broader audience. My family hails from their neighborhood and I can vouch for their cooking--we've enjoyed their food many times in person. This is a GREAT DVD collection!
summary: Pat and Gina are BBQ rock stars!

reviewText: I Choose 5 Stars  Because ,these two people are the best at what they do, the most is cooking..what  I  like about Down Home with the Neelys, is they are funny and fun in the Kitchen, and they Love to Kiss and Play in the kitchen when they are cooking together.the Neely are always Happy and they Knows how to cook and put Meals together and make it taste good. I have tried cooking the Banana Pudding, By the Neelys And it taste soo, Good..I Purchases The Neelys for my mother,and she love them and she love watching them cook and have fun in the kitchen..I Would Recommend this product to anyone who love cooking!!  When you buy Down Home With The Neelys, You Will see that I was right, and if you try cooking one of the Recipes, that's By the neelys you will see that they Food taste Great!! Thank You,NEELY'S...
